root: ^Well, Ms. Sweets. I think you did it. I'm giving you the chance to come clean.
^You were selling mercury to him, and you had the most contact with him out of everyone.
^You asked to meet him right before he was seen exiting through the back of the diner.
^I'm not! I didn't do it, I swear!
^That's what they all say. You're coming with me, Ms. Sweets.
^Don't take me away from the diner!
^Don't worry Ms. Sweets, she can visit you in prison.
